title: Ticket #942: Focus on wiki login page
description:
I don't like using the mouse :)

When I try to use the keyboard with the TAB key to fill in the initial login form I have to tab about 10 times to pass through all the links in the header bar and finally reach the Login button.

So I appended a bit of javascript to set the focus in the page headers as discussed at http://www.cvstrac.org/cvstrac/tktview?tn=806
remarks:
2009-Nov-13 06:37:53 by matt:
This explains why NoScript just started complaining about condor-wiki!
creator: tannenba
